org.weso.wesearch.domain

Class SPARQLQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.weso.wesearch.domain.SPARQLQueryBuilder

  • public class SPARQLQueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    It's an auxiliary class that helps wesearchs to build SPARQL queries
    Author:
    Ignacio Fuertes Bernardo

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeClause

        public static java.lang.String getTypeClause(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String objName)
                                      throws QueryBuilderException
        This method creates the type clause from a given name of variable and the name of the auxiliary variable. An example of SPARQL type clause is " ?x rdf:type ?y ."
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the filtered variable
        objName - The name of the auxiliary variable that will be filtered to limit the type of the main variable of the clause
        Returns:
        The type clause
        Throws:
        QueryBuilderException - This exception is thrown if some of the parameters is null

      • getPropertyClause

        public static java.lang.String getPropertyClause(java.lang.String name,
                                 Property property,
                                 java.lang.String objName)
                                          throws QueryBuilderException
        This method generates a property clause for a query from a given variable name, property and auxiliary variable. An example of SPARQL property clause is "?x foaf:name ?y ."
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the main variable of the clause
        property - The property that must be used in the clause
        objName - The name of the auxiliary variable used in object part of a clause
        Returns:
        The property clause generated
        Throws:
        QueryBuilderException - This exception is thrown if some of the parameters is null

      • getFilter

        public static Filter getFilter(java.lang.String name,
               ValueSelector selector)
                        throws QueryBuilderException
        This method generates a filter for a given variable name and a value selector
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the variable that must be filtered
        selector - The value selector that contains the values to filter
        Returns:
        The generated filter
        Throws:
        QueryBuilderException - This exception is thrown if one or more parameters are null

      • generateFilterClause

        private static java.lang.String generateFilterClause(java.lang.String name,
                                    ValueSelector selector)
        This method has to generate a filter clause corresponding with the type of the value selector
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the variable that has to be filtered
        selector - The selector to use in the filter
        Returns:
        The filter clause generated

      • getClassFilter

        public static SPARQLFilters getClassFilter(java.lang.String varName,
                           Matter matter,
                           OntoModelWrapper model)
                                    throws OntoModelException,
                                           QueryBuilderException
        This method generates a class filter given the name of a variable, a matter and the model to add subclasses
        Parameters:
        varName - The name of the variable that must be filtered
        matter - The matter that the variable that has to be
        model - The model to extract subclasses of the matter
        Returns:
        The generated filters
        Throws:
        OntoModelException - This exception is thrown if there is a problem extracting all subclassesof the given matter
        QueryBuilderException - This exception is thrown if there is a problem building the filter

      • concatAllClassFilter

        private static void concatAllClassFilter(java.lang.String varName,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> classes,
                        SPARQLFilters aux)
        This method has to concatenate all calls filter over one variable
        Parameters:
        varName - The name of the variable that has to be filtered
        classes - The list of all classes to filter the variable
        aux - The first class filter
